statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_details;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT qr_code, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT qr_code, payment_date FROM transaction_details ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT qr_code, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY qr_code ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, qr_code, amount, payment_date FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT qr_code, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE qr_code LIKE '%AB%'
SELECT transaction_id, qr_code, payment_date FROM transaction_details ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT transaction_id, qr_code, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE amount < 50 ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT * FROM transaction_details;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT qr_code_id, total_transactions, total_amount FROM qr_code_payment_history ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE status = 'SUCCESS' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT qr_code_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_details GROUP BY qr_code_id HAVING transaction_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT qr_code_id, total_transactions, total_amount FROM qr_code_payment_history WHERE total_transactions > 50;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE status = 'pending' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT qr_code_id, total_amount, last_transaction_timestamp FROM qr_code_payment_history WHERE total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Transactions
SELECT qr_code_id, transaction_amount FROM Transactions
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM QRCodeDetails WHERE merchant_id = 'c16d6d0e-5d5f-4d6c-b7cb-fa2e9e1ff77e'
SELECT qr_code_id, qr_code_description FROM QRCodeDetails
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT qr_code_description, qr_code_creation_date FROM QRCodeDetails WHERE merchant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, ph.payment_amount, ph.payment_date FROM Transactions t JOIN PaymentHistory ph ON t.transaction_id = ph.transaction_id WHERE t.transaction_amount >= 50 AND ph.payment_amount < 100 ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, t.transaction_date, qd.qr_code_description FROM Transactions t JOIN QRCodeDetails qd ON t.qr_code_id = qd.qr_code_id WHERE t.transaction_amount != 0 ORDER BY t.transaction_amount DESC

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, ph.payment_amount, ph.payment_date, qd.qr_code_description FROM Transactions t JOIN PaymentHistory ph ON t.transaction_id = ph.transaction_id JOIN QRCodeDetails qd ON t.qr_code_id = qd.qr_code_id WHERE ph.payment_amount >= 100 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM User WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, payment_method FROM TransactionDetails WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM PaymentHistory ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT qr_code_id, user_id, creation_date, expiration_date FROM QRCode;
SELECT * FROM TransactionDetails WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT qr_code_id, creation_date, expiration_date FROM QRCode WHERE user_id = 1234;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM User WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM PaymentHistory WHERE payment_status = 'success' AND payment_amount < 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, qr_code_id, payment_method FROM TransactionDetails WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM qr_codes WHERE expiration_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT payment_method, status FROM payments WHERE status = 'success';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT qr_code_id, qr_code_data, expiration_date FROM qr_codes WHERE expiration_date > NOW() ORDER BY expiration_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_method, status FROM payments WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY payment_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 7;
